steps.title: â€œMeirlâ€ became popular in the 90s.
steps.content: â€œMeirlâ€ became popular in the 90s. Believe it or not, this slang term has been around since the beginning of the internet! â€œIRLâ€ became well-known in the 1990s as chatroom and forum users looked for ways to shorthand expressions and type faster. â€œMe IRLâ€ quickly started to spread after popular artist, furry, and gamer Juriann Foxtail wrote in his websiteâ€™s about page, â€œIf you look closely, it even looks like me IRL,â€ referring to his updated Internet persona profile. [4] X Research source
